build 200304291456

1. in a Java editor, create the following class:

import java.util.Collections;
import java.util.List;

public class Main {
	private void foo() {
		Collections.sort(new List() { <--- cursor
		});
	}
}

2. the anonymous class gets the error and quick fix markers
